name: Keyrune
tagline: Magic: the Gathering set symbol pictographic font
body: # Keyrune v0.1 ## The Magic: the Gathering set symbol font! Keyrune is the first suite of complete Magic: the Gathering expansion and set symbols as a pictographic font. You can use this font anywhere you want to display set symbols—in your MtG app or website, documents, card images, anything! ## Usage Each set symbol has its own font character. Display them in a manner similar to [Font Awesome](http://fontawesome.io) using the `` element. Class name codes are based on the expansion codes from [MTG JSON](http://mtgjson.com). To use Keyrune, move the font files to your `/fonts` directory and include the keyrune.css stylesheet in your ``: ```html ``` ## Editing the Source Feel free to edit the source files and compile Keyrune to fit your needs. Currently LESS is supported, with Sass coming soon. ## License All set symbol images are copyright Wizards of the Coast ([http://magicthegathering.com](http://magicthegathering.com)) The Keyrune font is licensed under the the SIL OFL 1.1 ([http://scripts.sil.org/OFL](http://scripts.sil.org/OFL)) Keyrune CSS, LESS, and Sass files are licensed under the MIT License ([http://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.html](http://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.html)) Attribution is **greatly appreciated** but not required! ## Changelog * v0.1 - initial font creation and CSS/LESS files for all sets up to Fate Reforged
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
